input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

dataset_name.description: The name of this dataset, used in output files and within visualisations

samplesheet.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

publish_dir_mode.description: How to copy output from the work directory to the output directory

differential_model.description: Model to use to call differentially modified sites, as a comma-separated list. Options: adaptive_binomial, homo_norm, hetero_norm, binomial, beta_binomial

modification_calling_parameters.title: Modification calling parameters
modification_calling_parameters.description: Settings which control which sites are selected for differential calling.

max_negative_prob.description: Negative modification sites with probability within [x, 0.5] will be ignored

min_positive_prob.description: Positive modification sites with probability within [0.5, x] will be ignored

min_reads.description: Minimum non-ignored modifications needed at a transcript site (across all samples) to be called
